title: Triumph of Steam and Electricity Image MCQ 1

content.question: In the period circa 1750â€“1900, the historical process illustrated by the image led directly to all of the following major global transformations EXCEPT

choices.label: the outbreak of the Atlantic revolutions and the emergence of new states in the Americas
the transition from human- and animal-powered economies to fossil fuel-powered economies
a significant increase in transregional trade and migration
the increasing use of electricity in industrial and consumer applications

content.answer: the outbreak of the Atlantic revolutions and the emergence of new states in the Americas

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
